dcterms:creator: Y. G. Jiang
J. Liu
A. Roshan Zamir
G. Toderici
I. Laptev
M. Shah
R. Sukthankar
dcterms:description: A commonly-used dataset in TAD, containing 200 validation videos and 212 test videos with labeled temporal annotations from 20 action categories in sports.
dcterms:title: THUMOS14

dcterms:creator: Y. Liu
L. Ma
Y. Zhang
W. Liu
S. Chang
dcterms:description: A newly collected large-scale fine-grained TAD dataset containing 57,752 training instances from 8,440 videos and 24,236 validation instances from 4,174 videos and 21,336 testing instances from 4,118 videos, with 106 action categories.
dcterms:title: FineAction

dcterms:creator: F. C. Heilbron
V. Escorcia
B. Ghanem
J. C. Niebles
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing 10,024 training videos, 4,926 validation videos, and 5,044 test videos belonging to 200 activities covering sports, household, and working actions.
dcterms:title: ActivityNet-v1.3
